nodes.bodyText:
can we wrap this in a generic try {... } catch(Exception ex) {...} so that it never can happen that any kind of (runtime) exception (we did not think of) in the submission version service makes problem with saving the normal submission? (which should really always work!)
Here, we might also make sure the transaction is not rolled back if an exception in submissionVersionService occurs
